verses.1: Topa phat un. Ke始n, Topa ka phat ding hi.
verses.2: Ka hin lai teng Topa ka phat dinga, ka nuntak lai teng ka Pasian始 tungah phatnate ka sa ding hi.
verses.3: Huhna a hong pia thei lo uliante ahi a, mi mawkmawkte ahi zongin muang kei un.
verses.4: A husanna a bei ciangin lei ah ciahkik uh a, tua ni mahmah in a ngaihsutnate uh bei ta hi.
verses.5: Jakob始 Pasian pen amah huhpa hi-in, ama Topa Pasian a muang mipa mi lungdam ahi hi.
verses.6: Amah in vanlelei, tuipi le tuate sungah a om khempeuh bawl a, a tawntungin thuman hi.
verses.7: A kinengniam mite adingin thumanna sem khia a, gilkialte an a vak hi. Topa in thongkiate a khah khia hi.
verses.8: Topa in mittawte khua a musak hi. Topa in niamsakna a thuak mite sangtosak a, Topa in thuman mite a it hi.
verses.9: Topa in peemtate kem a, meigong numeite le pa nei lote a huh hi. Ahih hangin amah in migilote始 vaihawmna a suksiatsak hi.
verses.10: Zion aw, nangma Pasian Topa in khang tawntungin uk ding hi. Topa phat un.
